task.name: v.what.rast3
task.description: Uploads 3D raster values at positions of vector points to the table.
task.keywords: vector, sampling, raster, position, querying, attribute table, surface information

parameter.name: map
parameter.label: Name of vector points map for which to edit attributes
parameter.description: Or data source for direct OGR access

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number or name
parameter.description: Vector features can have category values in different layers. This number determines which layer to use. When used with direct OGR access this is the layer name.

parameter.name: raster_3d
parameter.description: Name of existing 3D raster map to be queried

parameter.name: column
parameter.description: Name of attribute column to be updated with the query result

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword
